td.content: s:a white female aged 61 years c/o 6 weeks h/o Kidney. denies any smoking denies any alcohol use o:Height 60 in, Weight 172 lbs, Temperature 97.9 F, Pulse 88, SystolicBP 104, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 16 a:Chronic Renal Failure p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Lisinopril - 20 mg daily, and ordered Abdominal CT Scan.

s:a white female aged 62 years presents with 2 years history of moderate belief that patient is infested with parasites that were injected by coworker because of jealousy. she denies smoking Patient reports that she never drinks alcohol o:Height 61 in, Weight 178 lbs, Temperature 98.2 F, Pulse 89, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 19 a:Paranoia p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed ZYPREXA - 10 mg /day, and ordered Urine toxicology.

content2.Unmatched: moderate belief that patient is infested
